title: taruvE ninaruL
sahitya:
taruvE ninnaruL tiruvE tandaruL vEl kara

anupallavi
 
karuvE tanai aravE en uravE shengamalaiyODu kalaimaghalaruLum uravE unai
maravEnE oN

caraNam
 
kanda nI tanda shentamizh ishai enginumE mundavashai shinda cinta vandaruL
sugandha phala canda mata kavi kunjaradAsan tanadu cintai nOi ventaravE sadguruvE
taN
